About us

Our Mission

At ICON Industries, our mission is to provide reliable, good-value, and durable 3D printing experiences to individuals and businesses across the UK. We're passionate about lowering the barrier to entry for modern tech while maintaining high standards of quality, customer service, and education.

What We Do

We specialise in:

  • Supplying carefully tested and recommended 3D printers and accessories
  • Publishing honest reviews on cutting-edge tech, including drones and maker tools
  • Helping creators and startups choose the right tools for their needs

Why We Exist

ICON Industries was built on a simple idea: empower people to make, build, and create without breaking the bank. With rising interest in home manufacturing, prototyping, and STEM learning, we’re here to support the next generation of innovators.

Beyond 3D Printing

While 3D printing is at our core, we also cover drones, sustainable tech, and automation. You’ll find practical advice, technical insights, and product recommendations on our website and YouTube channel.

Whether you’re a beginner, educator, maker, or professional, ICON Industries is your trusted partner in creative technology.
